newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan seeks 50,000 T motor gasoline in May-June.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan seeks 50,000 T motor gasoline in May-June.

text.p: Pakistan's Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Resources invited bids on Thursday for the supply of 50,000 tonees of motor gasoline for delivery in May and June.

An official at the ministry said suppliers of motor gasoline 80 and 87 RON should submit their bids by March 31 to supply 25,000 tonnes in May and the same quantity in June. Offers must remain valid until April 5.
